profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.
service_area: With showroom in Mississauga we serve entire GTA.

profile:
Techno Kitchen Refacing is an Ontario based kitchen renovation company that specializes in refacing, rather than replacing. Recently, we brought on another member to the team to supply the increasing demand. Now, we can serve you faster, and across a larger area.

Techno's word-of-mouth marketing philosophy shows how happy customers have been with the product. Honesty and customer satisfaction are of the utmost concern for Techno and the customer will benefit every time.

Want to see it for yourself? Our customers are so happy and enthusiastic about the work that they've allowed us to invite you into their homes to see firsthand the quality of the work. Call today and ask how to arrange a meeting with Frank.
service_area: Stoney Creek, Hamilton, Grimsby, St. Catherine's, Niagara, Welland, Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Caledon, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Markham, Ajax, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Oshawa, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Barrie, Muskoka, Kitchener, Cambridge, Waterloo, Guelph, Ayr, Orangeville, Flamborough, Waterdown
hours: Tuesday to Friday 10 am - 5 pm Saturday 10 am - 4 pm
products:
Why Choose Techno?
Full Satisfaction Guarantee! Real wood doors and veneer in several different stains, colors and species! No plastic, no paper, no cheap looking laminate! We're a member of the Better Business Bureau! You work directly with the owner who will be personally involved in making your dream kitchen a reality!
services: Cabinet repainting, cabinet refacing and custom-built cabinetry and entertainment units.
specialities:
*WE SPECIALIZE IN REAL WOOD*
After 15 years of experience in the woodworking and cabinetry industry, Techno founder Frank Silletti chose to start his own refacing company with the goal of giving homeowners in Ontario a more affordable alternative to traditional kitchen remodeling. Frank says "By using the cabinet refacing process, we are able to dramatically cut down the time, cost and inconvenience of building and creating your dream kitchen". With the experience and the motivation to back his work, you can be sure Frank will be there to answer any questions or concerns to deliver the best value and quality of work available. Please feel free to visit the contact page and fill out an information request form. We look forward to hearing from you!
name: Techno Kitchen Refacing

profile:
SL Stone Works is well committed to giving their valued customers quality, attention to details, professionalism, and total satisfaction. No project is too big or too small for us to complete with precision, quality, and care. We are working with the newest technology, CNC, for kitchen solution.

SL Stone Works was founded by Sarat Lao in 2013, and we believe in giving back. We offer humanitarian work in Cambodia by donating 2% of our sales to orphanages in hopes of rebuilding our community, a conglomerate of Kitchen Counter tops, Bar tops, Fireplaces, Residential, Commercial business , and home renovation entities, GTA, across Canada and Cambodia.

The combined expertise of our partner companies, Quality Marble Design Inc. SI04 Stone Inc. Lapidus Surface Inc., and Square Peg Woodworking Inc. has been very successful for over 20 years.

We offer very competitive price points through our established network of suppliers, services, and other resources, our consultation is free at your place, our turn around is fast, and our team is highly admired for the quality of their workmanship, holds a diverse portfolio of projects.

Please follow in our YouTube channel 

https://youtube.com/channel/UCDt8TzA2M40lntSk4Q6oNJA

Designing the look you want while staying within your budget.

Founder and Owner,
Sarat Lao

profile:
Marble Granite Countertops Inc. (MGC Inc.) has the capabilities to meet your aesthetic and design needs. Our assets lie in more than 15 years of experience and skills which our staff brings to the table, resulting in a high quality product delivered on time. We work with designers, architects and home builders to accommodate residential and commercial applications. We also specialize in working with a variety of stones such as Granite, Marble, Limestone, Quartz, Slate and more.
 
Our fabrication facility has all the tools and equipment required to guarantee a product of excellent quality and during fabrication quality control measures are in place to ensure that anything that leaves our facility has been thoroughly reviewed by a full time on-site supervisor. Whether your project is a kitchen counter-top, vanity, tub surrounding, fire place, or custom piece, our goal is to ensure 100% satisfaction on any finished product.

GTA Countertops has more than 10 years of combined experience in the fabrication and installation of stone products. We purchase a carefully selected variety of granite, marble and quartz in large quantities and stock it locally. We pride ourselves in helping you achieve a more beautiful, money saving and practical approach to improving your dream home, we do not outsource any part of your project to another company, from start to finish, it is completed by our company!

products: Choose from our selection of hand-picked, unique and authentic imported and domestic granite stones. Kitchen,bath,office,den,bathroom or entrance hall,granite and marble can add that elegant touch to any room of your home. Whether it is a simple touch or a grand impression, let the natural beauty and tones found in authentic granite and marble complete your home
services: Ontario Stone Design is a family owned business that has over 28 years of experience of quality workmanship at the absolute best price! Granite and marble stone work has always been our passion. We take pride in knowing that all projects are unique, no standard is too high, and our clients are always our first priority.
brands: Like a diamond, there are many imitations, but there
specialities:
Step 1. Getting Started

Meet with sales consultant at our showroom located at 520 Burlington St. E. (at Wentworth St), Hamilton, Ontario L8L 4J2. During this process we will help you to conceive the finished natural stone project that you wished for. Please bring your cabinet plans or a drawing of the project concept with the dimensions. You may also like to bring in a sample of your cabinets or tile to help you select the stone for your home.
Fill out our contact form or Call our office at 905.296.8799

After the final price is confirmed the installation schedule will be established at a future date. It usually takes 7-10 working days to fabricate and install the project. The final payment is required no later than on the day of installation. We are not specialized in plumbing and electricity. We appreciate your business and look forward to a successful project experience.

Step 2. Measurements

When cabinets are in place we will measure/template your job. The final price will be calculated based on the template measurements and confirmed. A 50% deposit is required at this time.

Step 3. Installation

Once final price is confirmed, fabrication usually takes 7-10 business days. Installation date will be arranged and final payment is required at the time of installation. We are not specialized in plumbing and electrical. We appreciate your business and look forward to a successful project experience!
name: Ontario Stone Design
